content: Be clear and accurate. When listing items, do not describe them. When writing code, include only new, changed, or deleted lines and specify which is which.

Firebase is a mobile and web development platform developed by Google. It provides a set of tools and services to help developers build high-quality apps, grow user bases, and earn more revenue. Firebase includes features such as real-time database, authentication, hosting, cloud messaging, and analytics. It also has integrations with other Google services such as Google Cloud Platform and Google Ads.
